name: Nase Gehäuse entfernen
description: Entferne das Nase Gehäuse (DPN239-009) und die Nase Gehäuse Mutter (PN239-011) vom Werkzeug.

name: Jaw Component Removal
description: Remove multiple jaw components from the tool including Jaw Guide, Jaws, Jaw Pusher, and Jaw Pusher Spring.

name: Tool Preparation for Corner Head Installation
description: Prepare the tool for the installation of the Corner Head.

name: Draw Bolt Adapter Attachment
description: Attach the Draw Bolt Adapter and tighten it securely.

name: Attach Corner Head Adapter
description: Attach the Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191) and secure it tightly.

name: Tighten Socket Head Screw
description: Tighten the socket head screw and secure the draw bolt adapter.

name: Attach CORNER HEAD to Draw Bolt Adapter
description: Attach the CORNER HEAD to the Draw Bolt Adapter (DPN239-192).

name: Socket Screw Removal and CORNER HEAD Attachment
description: Remove the Socket Screw (DPN907-003) and attach the CORNER HEAD to the Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191).

name: Tighten Corner Head Nut
description: Tighten the nut of the Corner Head onto the Corner Head Adapter.

name: Abstandseinstellung zwischen CORNER HEAD und Corner Head Adapter
description: Stelle 8,5 mm oder weniger Abstand zwischen dem CORNER HEAD und dem Corner Head Adapter (DPN239-191) ein.

name: Tool Readiness Check
description: The tool is now ready for operation after assembly.
